mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.market_id AS "marketId", a.content AS "content", a.evaluate AS "evaluate", a.create_id AS "createId", a.photo_url1 AS "photoUrl1", a.create_name AS "createName", a.is_anony AS "isAnony", a.photo_url2 AS "photoUrl2", a.photo_url3 AS "photoUrl3", a.photo_url4 AS "photoUrl4", a.photo_url5 AS "photoUrl5", a.photo_url6 AS "photoUrl6"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( market_id, content, evaluate, create_id, photo_url1, create_name, is_anony, photo_url2, photo_url3, photo_url4, photo_url5, photo_url6 ) VALUES ( #{marketId}, #{content}, #{evaluate}, #{createId}, #{photoUrl1}, #{createName}, #{isAnony}, #{photoUrl2}, #{photoUrl3}, #{photoUrl4}, #{photoUrl5}, #{photoUrl6} )
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET market_id = #{marketId}, content = #{content}, evaluate = #{evaluate}, create_id = #{createId}, photo_url1 = #{photoUrl1}, create_name = #{createName}, is_anony = #{isAnony}, photo_url2 = #{photoUrl2}, photo_url3 = #{photoUrl3}, photo_url4 = #{photoUrl4}, photo_url5 = #{photoUrl5}, photo_url6 = #{photoUrl6} WHERE id = #{id}
